scenario_text.value: Bah, looks like this isn’t it either.

Yeah, apparently this is just an ordinary
bed.
And a real beat up one at that!

Still, the sight of it *yawn*...makes me feel
sleepy.
You want to take a nap on THAT?
I don’t think that’s the best idea.

Hey, I just said it made me feel sleepy,
okay?
Come on, we should search <color=#B41919>somewhere else</color>.

Don’t worry, I’m not about to take a nap
here.
